content: in next 5 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 3 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts twice 1 double_crochet in first corner join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet 15 single_crochet 18 half_double_crochet 24 double_crochet 3 x chain 2 space round 6 slip_stitch to chain 2 corner space chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st corner chain 1 skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in next st chain 1 skip 1 st 9 times 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next st corner chain 1 skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in next st chain 1 skip 1 st 8 times twice 1 double_crochet in first corner join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off weave in all ends block the finished triangles 39 double_crochet 30 x chain 1 space 3 x chain 2 space 3 k a m e crochet designs 2024 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved finishing choose an order for your trianlges i have chosen a pastel rainbow order with c2 white make a slip knot and then chain 20 grab your first triangle and put 1 single_crochet in any of the chain 2 corner spaces 1 single_crochet in each st and chain 1 space on one side 1 single_crochet in the chain 2 corner space chain 15 then grab your next triangle and put 1 single_crochet in any of the corners 1 single_crochet in each st on one side 1 single_crochet in the chain 2 corner space 5 times chain 20 then fasten_off and weave all remaining ends in optional you can add tassels to each triangle if desired thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it remember to tag me @k a m e_crochet or use hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram you can also join my facebook group where you can get updates on new pattern releases or help with existing ones if you get stuck https //www facebook com/groups/975632939436008/ ref=bookmarks if you have any questions about the pattern you can also contact me directly at kamecrochet@gmail com or youtube https //www youtube com/channel/uci4snch5kosqzqfrmbzebqq ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/mytia89 facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting
